President Donald Trump took a sarcastic dig at Rep. Mark Sanford , a South Carolina Republican who [V: has] been critical of the president , during a meeting on immigration with House Republicans Tuesday night . Sanford fired back later , telling The Associated Press that he found it " startling " that Trump would attack him during a meeting about " a crisis . "
